page_description: Our commitment to digital accessibility and WCAG compliance
statement_subtitle: We dey committed to make Wellio accessible for everybody
commitment_text: Wellio dey committed to ensure digital accessibility for people wey get disability. We dey continuously improve user experience and dey apply di relevant accessibility standards.
standards_subtitle: We dey aim to comply with WCAG 2.1 Level AA guidelines
wcag_perceivable_desc: Information and user interface components fit present for ways wey users fit perceive.
wcag_operable_desc: User interface components and navigation dey operable by all users.
wcag_understandable_desc: Information and di operation of user interface dey understandable.
wcag_robust_desc: Content dey robust enough to be interpreted by assistive technologies.
features_subtitle: Features wey we don implement to improve accessibility
feature_screen_reader: Screen reader compatibility with ARIA labels
feature_resize: Text resizing up to 200% without losing functionality
feature_motion: Reduced motion option for users wey sensitive to animations
feature_focus: Visible focus indicators for keyboard users
feature_alt_text: Alternative text for all meaningful images
feature_semantic: Semantic HTML structure for better navigation
assistive_text: Wellio dey designed to work with assistive technologies including:
feedback_subtitle: We welcome your feedback on accessibility
feedback_text: If you encounter accessibility barriers or get suggestions for improvement, abeg contact us.
improvement_text: We dey committed to continuously improving di accessibility of Wellio.
